title: Mobile Media-Integrated Education Design: Blended Learning-Based Simulation/VR Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and basic social studies concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD). VR simulations implement social problem-solving scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously operate educational content by integrating mobile devices with cloud-based Learning Management Systems (LMS)
Learners can analyze real-world social scenarios through VR simulations and perform data-driven decision-making
Learners can improve project outcomes through real-time interaction with peers and instructors via mobile feedback systems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
